text: "If You're Gone" is a 2000 song by Matchbox Twenty and is the second single from their second studio album Mad Season. It went to number 5 in the United States, number 12 in New Zealand, number 16 in the Netherlands, number 18 in Australia, number 27 in Canada and number 50 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listings== UK CD single # "If You're Gone" (edit) – 4:21 # "If You're Gone" (album version) – 4:33 # "Bent" (live) – 4:36 European CD single # "If You're Gone" (edit) – 4:21 # "Bent" (live) – 4:36 Australian maxi-CD single # "If You're Gone" (album version) # "Bent" (live) # "Back 2 Good" (live) == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Matchbox Twenty songs
title: If You're Gone (Matchbox Twenty song)
